title: Bruteforce in admin panel
content:
Hello there,
Admin panel of your website (https://nextcloud.com/wp-login.php) is vulnerable to bruteforce attacks as their is no rate-limiting.
Impact
Can gain access to admin panel.
To fix this, Just add rate limiting.
steps: Navigate to the admin panel login page at https://nextcloud.com/wp-login.php
Use a tool like Hydra or Burp Suite to perform a bruteforce attack by sending multiple login attempts with different credentials
vuln_description: The admin panel of the website is vulnerable to bruteforce attacks due to the absence of rate-limiting, allowing attackers to potentially gain unauthorized access by repeatedly trying different credentials.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it only requires attempting multiple login requests without any sophisticated techniques or understanding of complex application states.
